definition: to press hard/to close in on
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]

sentences.english: The Americans kept hustling, and it finally paid off in the 104th minute.
sentences.chinese: 美國人繼續緊逼，最終在第104分鐘得到回報。

sentences.english: Tight marking or even man marking in midfield can have massive effects on the defensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 中場的緊逼盯人甚至人盯人對防守相當有利。

sentences.english: The full-court press is legs, not arms.
sentences.chinese: 全場緊逼靠的是腳，而非手。

sentences.english: I knew your team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court pre .
sentences.chinese: 我知道你們球隊打破了上海隊的半場緊逼。

sentences.english: Do you know how to play full-court press?
sentences.chinese: 你會打全場區域緊逼嗎？

sentences.english: He never used the full-court press the same way again.
sentences.chinese: 在餘下的賽季，他再也沒那樣使用全場緊逼。

sentences.english: Armed police have barricaded people again, stepping forward forcing them back.
sentences.chinese: 武警再築人牆，雙方步步緊逼。

sentences.english: When he first time has dribbled half-court encounters presses hard on, and presents the fault.
sentences.chinese: 在他第一次帶球過半場時就遭到緊逼，並出現失誤。

sentences.english: Yet the puzzle of the press is that it has never become popular.
sentences.chinese: 令人不解的是，全場緊逼戰術從來沒有真正流行起來。

sentences.english: Added Tight Marking to view menu in the in-match tactics .
sentences.chinese: 添加爲比賽中的戰術菜單添加緊逼防守選項。

sentences.english: The NBA, meanwhile, is making a full-court press.
sentences.chinese: 同時，NBA在製造全場緊逼時。

sentences.english: Our team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court press.
sentences.chinese: 我們球隊打破了上海隊的半場緊逼。

sentences.english: You can also toggle between Loose/Tight marking.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在寬鬆盯防和緊逼盯防中切換。

sentences.english: I know your team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court press.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你們球隊打破了上海隊的半場緊逼。

sentences.chinese: 我知道你們球隊打破了上海隊的半場緊逼。
